alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 10:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Central Ohio, including the following county, Fayette OH. * WHEN...Until 200 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1053 PM EDT, Although heavy rain has ended, areal flooding is still ongoing from the recent heavy rainfall. It will take some time for waters to recede. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Washington Court House.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
